thread.title: vivo V5 Plus with dual selfie cameras launched in India for Rs 27,980
thread.title_full: vivo V5 Plus with dual selfie cameras launched in India for Rs 27,980

title: vivo V5 Plus with dual selfie cameras launched in India for Rs 27,980
text:
vivo V5 Plus with dual selfie cameras launched in India for Rs... vivo V5 Plus with dual selfie cameras launched in India for Rs 27,980 By January 23, 2017 “The V5 Plus is a premium phablet featuring 20MP + 8MP selfie cameras” 
vivo has officially launched its latest V-series smartphone called the V5 Plus in India. It is a selfie-centric phone with two front cameras. The phone features 20MP and 8MP shooters and a front-facing LED flash. The dual cameras allow you to achieve a realistic bokeh effect with your face in focus and a blurred background. The device also flaunts a metal unibody design with a fingerprint sensor that’s embedded into its home button. 
As far as the other specs are concerned, the vivo V5 Plus features a 5.5-inch full HD display with a layer of Corning Gorilla Glass 5. The phone is powered by a 2.0GHz octa-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 625 processor, mated to a beefy 4GB of RAM. The storage capacity on board is 64GB, which can’t be expanded further as the device lacks a microSD card slot. 
At the rear, the vivo V5 Plus sports a 16-megapixel primary shooter with an LED flash and 4K video recording support. Software-wise, the handset boots Funtouch OS 3.0, which is based on Android Marshmallow. In terms of connectivity, it offers 4G LTE, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and GPS. A 3,055mAh battery with fast charging support keeps the package running. 
The vivo V5 Plus has been priced at Rs 27,980. The phone will be available to pre-order starting tomorrow in the major brick-and-mortar stores across the country. It will go on open sale starting from February 1st. Facebook Comments
